author: Staff Reporter
text:
Kovai Medical Center and Hospital (KMCH) has bagged two awards recently.

Best hospital

Hospital chairman Nalla G. Palanisamy said that the awards were the Green Hospital Award - 2016 from Association of Healthcare that was given away in Mumbai in January and the Best Hospital Award - 2016 by the Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry and the Government of Tamil Nadu in Chennai in February.
title: KMCH bags two awards
